pre.description: @param result the result to return on successful completion. If you don't need a particular result consider using constructions of the form: ListenableFuture<?> f = ListenableFutureTask.create(runnable. result is null).

guard.description: the result to return on successful completion. If you don't need a particular result consider using constructions of the form: ListenableFuture<?> f = ListenableFutureTask.create(runnable. result is null).
